Name: Prohibit the use of child day cares, day care centers, or community-based organizations which support activities for children under the age of eighteen as a shelter for migrants (S.7417/A.8013).
Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.7417/A.8013, to prohibit the use of child day cares, day care centers, or community-based organizations which support activities for children under the age of eighteen as a shelter for migrants

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
